Class Lpu237Tags

java.lang.Object
kr.co.elpusk.android.liblpu237.lpu237.Lpu237Tags
public class Lpu237Tags extends Object
pre/postfix key object class of lpu237

    • Lpu237Tags

      public Lpu237Tags(byte[] tags)
      constructor with definition keys
      Parameters:
      tags - definition keys, The size must be a multiple of 2.
      One key consists of 2 bytes.

  • Method Details

    • push_back

      public void push_back(byte c_modifier, byte c_key)
      add the new key at the end.
      this key is USB HID Key type
      Parameters:
      c_modifier - Modifier masks, used for the first byte in the HID report.
      0x01 - left control key.
      0x02 - left shift key.
      0x04 - left alt key.
      c_key - USB HID Keyboard scan codes as per USB spec 1.11(HID Usage ID value)
      See Also:
      • USB HID to PS/2 Scan Code Translation Table

    • is_empty

      public boolean is_empty()
      check whether or not key is empty.
      Returns:
      true ->empty.
      false -> not empty.

    • is_full

      public boolean is_full()
      check whether or not key is full(maximum size).
      Returns:
      true ->full.
      false -> not full.

    • max_size

      public int max_size()
      get the maximum number of keys that can be stored.
      Returns:
      the maximum number of keys that can be stored.

      public void resize(int n_tag)
      resize the maximum number of keys that can be stored.

    • set_tag

      public void set_tag(byte[] tags)
      copy new Lpu237Tags object to this.
      Parameters:
      tags - key definition array. The size must be a multiple of 2.

    • get_tag

      public byte[] get_tag()
      get internal all key array( including null key(0x00,0x00) )
      Returns:
      byte[] type ,internal all key array

    • copy_to

    • get_tag_stream_with_length

      public byte[] get_tag_stream_with_length()
      get byte array that all tag key( including null key(0x00,0x00) ).
      the first byte is the length of saved key(unit is byte. NOT key. excluding null key(0x00,0x00) )
      Returns:
      the first byte is the length of saved key and all tag key.

    • equal

      public boolean equal(Lpu237Tags tag)
      Check if all key values are the same.
      Parameters:
      tag - Lpu237Tags
      Returns:
      true -> same.
      false -> not same.
